Meersolar Pipeline Module
==========================
This is main module of the pipeline handling all calibration and imaging jobs.
  
meersolar.pipeline.basic\_func module
-------------------------------------

.. automodule:: meersolar.pipeline.basic_func
   :members:
   :undoc-members:
   :show-inheritance:
   
   .. note ::

      All functions in ``basic_func`` module are written in commented blocks for ease of maintainance. Developers are requested to add new functions in appropriate blocks. If no suitable block is found, add in ``Basic utility funactions`` block.
      
     .. admonition:: Click here to see the list of blocks
      :class: dropdown
 
         - Basic utility funactions
         - Logger related functions
         - Resource management
         - MeerSOLAR process management
         - Measurement set metadata
         - General CASA tasks
         - Flagging related functions
         - Calibration related
         - Imaging related
         - Image analysis related
         - Plotting related functions
         - Sun position related
         - uDOCKER related
